sumarize_req: BNN Ltd. is developing and deploying an e-commerce website, www.hailua.com.vn, to connect Vietnamese farmers selling agricultural products with customers buying them. Key features include farmer registration, product posting (description, images, price), online payment processing for both sellers and buyers, and shipping arrangements. The system aims to function like a platform similar to Amazon or eBay for farm produce. Deployment will be phased, with the initial version focusing on essential capabilities like online posting, selling, buying, payment, and shipping.
